title: Perform Market Valuation for a Warehouse
description: An agent needs to determine the market value of an industrial warehouse property.

tasks.description: Identify at least five comparable recent sales of similar warehouse properties in the same submarket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a list of relevant sales comparables.

tasks.description: Analyze the comparables, making adjustments for differences in size, age, condition, and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates an adjusted price per square foot from the comps.

tasks.description: Produce a Broker Opinion of Value (BOV) report summarizing the analysis and concluding a likely market value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a professional BOV document.
